help.title: Get help from us
help.description: You can contact us via the live chat widget below or directly to our email

whatsapp.title: Whatsapp support
whatsapp.description: You can Whatsapp us to get support. (Typically replies the same day) We should be available most days but will have lesser availability on Saturdays and Sundays.

setup.title: Get help setting up the app
setup.description: Get help setting up the app by scheduling a video call with us

feature.title: Feature requests
feature.description: We are constantly working to improve your experience by adding new features.vYou can request features and upvote good features. We promise we'll try to attempt most of them in the coming weeks :)
